LanguageData.Heart.label: heart
LanguageData.Heart.description: A biological human heart. Pumps blood around the body.
LanguageData.Kidney.label: kidney
LanguageData.Kidney.description: A biological human kidney. Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
LanguageData.Liver.label: liver
LanguageData.Liver.description: A biological human liver. Plays an important role in metabolism.
LanguageData.Lung.label: lung
LanguageData.Lung.description: A biological human lung. A pair of these form the core of the human respiratory system.
